languages.text: {n}Будь у вас хотя бы пара часов на разведку корабля, вы бы, без сомнения, нашли достаточно укромных шахт и вскрытых отсеков, чтобы покинуть корабль. Но в данный момент вам известна лишь одна точка, через которую вы можете бежать — шлюз, через который вы сюда проникли. Любой другой путь может завести в тупик.{/n}

{n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Будь у вас хотя бы пара часов на разведку корабля, вы бы, без сомнения, нашли достаточно укромных шахт и вскрытых отсеков, чтобы покинуть корабль. Но в данный момент вам известна лишь одна точка, через которую вы можете бежать — шлюз, через который вы сюда проникли. Любой другой путь может завести в тупик.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}If you'd had a few hours to explore the ship, you'd surely have found any number of discreet shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

{n}If you'd had a few hours to explore the ship, you'd surely have found any number of discreet shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

{n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

{n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

{n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si tuvieras varias horas para explorar la nave, seguramente encontrarías diversos conductos camuflados y módulos desbloqueados por los que abandonar la nave, pero ahora mismo la única ruta de escape que conoces es la esclusa por la que has entrado. Cualquier otra ruta podría llevar a un callejón sin salida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si tuvieras varias horas para explorar la nave, seguramente encontrarías diversos conductos camuflados y módulos desbloqueados por los que abandonar la nave, pero ahora mismo la única ruta de escape que conoces es la esclusa por la que has entrado. Cualquier otra ruta podría llevar a un callejón sin salida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}如果你有几个小时的时间来探索这艘船的话，你肯定能找到许多离散的通道与已经解锁的舱室，可以通过这些区域来离开这艘船。但现在，你只知道一条可能逃脱的逃生路线：通过气闸，原路返回。如果到处乱跑，可能会跑到死胡同里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}如果你有几个小时的时间来探索这艘船的话，你肯定能找到许多离散的通道与已经解锁的舱室，可以通过这些区域来离开这艘船。但现在，你只知道一条可能逃脱的逃生路线：通过气闸，原路返回。如果到处乱跑，可能会跑到死胡同里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}数時間でも船を探索する時間があれば、確かに船の脱出に使える離脱シャフトとロック解除済みのモジュールをいくつか見つけられただろう。今の状態で、認識できる脱出ルートはただひとつ。エアロックを通って、来た道を戻ることだ。他の道は、行き止まりになっているかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数時間でも船を探索する時間があれば、確かに船の脱出に使える離脱シャフトとロック解除済みのモジュールをいくつか見つけられただろう。今の状態で、認識できる脱出ルートはただひとつ。エアロックを通って、来た道を戻ることだ。他の道は、行き止まりになっているかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hättest du einige Stunden für die Erkundung des Schiffs gehabt, hättest du sicher abgelegene Schächte und unverschlossene Module gefunden, um das Schiff zu verlassen. Aber akut kennst du nur einen einzigen möglichen Fluchtweg: durch die Luftschleuse, wie du auch gekommen bist. Alles andere könnte sich als Sackgasse herausstellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hättest du einige Stunden für die Erkundung des Schiffs gehabt, hättest du sicher abgelegene Schächte und unverschlossene Module gefunden, um das Schiff zu verlassen. Aber akut kennst du nur einen einzigen möglichen Fluchtweg: durch die Luftschleuse, wie du auch gekommen bist. Alles andere könnte sich als Sackgasse herausstellen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si vous aviez quelques heures devant vous, vous finiriez certainement par trouver des conduits discrets et des modules ouverts qui vous permettraient de quitter le vaisseau. Dans la situation actuelle, cependant, vous ne voyez qu'une seule option pour fuir : le sas, par là où vous êtes {mf|entré|entrée}. Tenter de suivre une autre voie risquerait de vous mener dans une impasse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si vous aviez quelques heures devant vous, vous finiriez certainement par trouver des conduits discrets et des modules ouverts qui vous permettraient de quitter le vaisseau. Dans la situation actuelle, cependant, vous ne voyez qu'une seule option pour fuir : le sas, par là où vous êtes {mf|entré|entrée}. Tenter de suivre une autre voie risquerait de vous mener dans une impasse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gemiyi keşfedecek birkaç saatin olsaydı çok sayıda münferit boşluk ya da kilitlenmemiş modül bulman işten bile olmazdı. Mevcut durumda aklına gelen tek kaçış yoluysa hava kilidinden, yani gelirken kullandığınız yoldan geçiyor. Diğer tüm yollar, hepinizi çıkmaza sürükleyebilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you had had a few hours to explore the ship, you surely would have found any number of discrete shafts and unlocked modules you could use to leave the ship. As it is, you're only aware of a single possible escape route: through the airlock, back the way you came. Any other path may lead to a dead end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gemiyi keşfedecek birkaç saatin olsaydı çok sayıda münferit boşluk ya da kilitlenmemiş modül bulman işten bile olmazdı. Mevcut durumda aklına gelen tek kaçış yoluysa hava kilidinden, yani gelirken kullandığınız yoldan geçiyor. Diğer tüm yollar, hepinizi çıkmaza sürükleyebilir.{/n}
